metadata.synopsis: Dialog with Lia, who is now working at Sorcerous Sundries, following his brother Rolan, who is now an apprentice there. For her to be there, she needs to have been saved in Act 2.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Interact with Lia in Sorcerous Sundries.Location: CTY_Main_A -15; 26; -80

0.speaker: Lia
0.text: Heard you put that prick Lorroakan in the ground - good. Only sad I couldn't help.
0.context: NodeContext: fierce - wished she had been there to help rolan

3.speaker: Lia
3.text: Thank you - for having Rolan's back. You just can't stop saving us, can you?

1.speaker: Lia
1.text: I once thought the best we could hope for in Baldur's Gate was a room above the Blushing Mermaid...
1.context: NodeContext: Looking around - smile on her face

2.speaker: Lia
2.context: NodeContext: Gestures around her - sad smile (cal is dead)
